short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No need to search for coupons & deals. Get them right in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension fetches active Coupons & Deals from the 
 website
This is why it helps the user to get the coupons available on the website without making an effort to search for them and without going every time to our website to search for coupons and deals.
Also, if this product is offered a cashback, the extension will provide it
